page.title: 08CLUBS AND ORGANISATIONS
page.content: Here is a list of the clubs and organisations which are in Hodnet: {Name of Organisation: Meet at: 1 British Legion Legion Room 2 Brownies School Hall 3 Cancer Research HWMC 4 Cricket Club C C Pavilion 5 Cub Scouts School Hall 6 Darts Club HWMC 7 Fishing Club HWMC 8 Football Club HWMC 9 Garden Club Lyon Hall 10 Guides School Hall 11 Mothers' Union Rectory 12 PTA School 13 Scouts School Hall 14 Tennis Club Wollerton T.C 15 Womens Institute W.I. Cottage 16 Working Mens' Club HWMC 17 Youth Club Legion Room 18 Senior Citizens HWMC Compiled by Robert Hopkins 10
